segments.text: What a mess in this kitchen, water spilling all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water rushing out?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are raiding the cookie jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that flimsy stool, it's ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's a slippery hazard now, thanks to the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cabinets will warp from all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, hand out like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is infuriating, so much carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Adults should watch their kids better than this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming just looking at it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
